Class: DataSet

DataSet(_inputs, _targets)

The inputs and targets that will be used to train and test network models.

Constructor

new DataSet(_inputs, _targets)

Creates an instance of DataSet.
Parameters:
Name Type Description
_inputs TFNestedArray The cases that will be sent to TF's model fit(). The values must be nested arrays, because they will become TF tensors. See https://js.tensorflow.org/api/latest/#tensor for details. Note that the flat-array option is not yet supported.
_targets ArrayOrder2 The output values associated with the input data. Must be a two-dimensional nested array. Note: Proper format flexibility is coming soon!
Source:
  • lib/DataSet.js, line 6
Example
// create a data set with inputs and targets for three cases
new tngs.DataSet([[ 0, 2, 0, 4 ], [ 9, 2, 9, 6 ], [ 3, 5, 7, 1 ]],
                 [[ 1, 0, 0 ], [ 0, 1, 0 ], [ 0, 0, 1 ]]);

// In this data, there are four inputs for each case. The targets are
// one-hot classification probabilities, labeled "even", "mixed" and
// "odd".
